message: Let's make a deal quickly. This is my offer. You get something, and I get to avoid dealing with inflation.
Let's be fair, Alice. This offer accounts for the time-value of money.
Bob, my friend, this deal is still good for you. Inflation is eating your gains, don't wait any longer!
Alice, this is my final offer. It's clear you value closing this quickly, so let's settle and avoid further losses to inflation.
